---
title: Anterior Longitudinal Ligament (ALL)

---

# Anatomy

The Anterior longitudinal ligament spans vertically from the Sacrum to anterior part of C2



# Function

FXN: Restricts extension @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020

# Dysfunction

The ALL is vulnerable to hyperextension trauma @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
